whisper_hyp: दबा इतना बारी ता की में ल्से हिला नहीं सगा
mms_1b_hyp: तुम्हारे पास तीन महीने बच्चे हैं
mms_zs_hyp: dabaitna bharii thakii min lsye hila niim ska
omni_hyp: डबा इतنा भारी थا कि मैं उसे हिला नہीं सका
ref_dev: डब्बा इतना भारी था कि मैं उसे हिला नहीं सका।

llm_decision.raw:
LANGUAGE: Hindi  
TRANSCRIPTION: डबा इतना भारी था कि मैं उसे हिला नहीं सका  
CONFIDENCE: high  
REASONING: The OmniASR transcription is the most accurate and natural in Devanagari script, correctly capturing the intended meaning: "The box was so heavy that I couldn't move it." Whisper and MMS-1B have significant errors (e.g., "दबा" vs "डबा", "बारी ता की" vs "भारी था कि"), while MMS-ZeroShot is romanized and contains phonetic inaccuracies. OmniASR's output is grammatically correct, contextually appropriate, and matches the likely intended sentence.
